Package com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.user.common

package com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.user.common
This package provides common classes and interfaces for the user views within the Citizen Intelligence Agency web application. Key classes and interfaces: - AbstractActorView: Base class for actor views. - AbstractGroupView: Base class for group views. - AbstractPersonView: Base class for person views. - AbstractRankingView: Base class for ranking views. - AbstractUserView: Base class for user views. Dependencies and relationships: - Depends on com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.common for AbstractView. - Depends on com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.common.pagemode for PageModeContentFactory. - Depends on com.hack23.cia.web.impl.ui.application.views.common.viewnames for UserViews. - Depends on org.springframework.context for ApplicationContext. - Depends on com.vaadin.spring.annotation for SpringView.
